trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting details\when we first saw it it was pretty close. it seemed as if it noticed that we saw it.it slowly started moving south, and then slow disappear. we kept watching the sky and then before we know it it appeared again. it stayed it placed for a few, it was as if the ball was watching the fireworks, then it disappeared and then about 10 mins. later it was back and then disappeared.. i tried to take a pic with cell phone but cant really see it. but i still have it....there were about 15 people who saw it... \
